stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Identify ONE social or political factor in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries that contributed to the spread of Christianity in Africa or Asia.

  2. Explain how ONE global economic development in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries contributed to the spread of Christianity in Africa or Asia.

  3. Explain how ONE factor limited the global spread of Christianity in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries.
